remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数返回类型的对象，其中包含对等方的完全限定的名称。This constructor returns an object of type that contains the fully qualified name of the peer. 它还指定是否是保护对等机名称或不被保护。It also specifies whether the peer name is secured or unsecured. 此实例使用适用于当前用户和指定默认对等标识，除了对等名称来创建具有指定的分类器和类型的类型。This instance uses the default peer identity for the current user and the specified , in addition to the type of peer name to create with the specified classifier and type.

exception.span: 包含一个或多个非法字符。

span.span: The includes one or more illegal characters.
One or more parameters are .

- 无法检索用作 基础的默认标识。The Default Identity used as the basis of the could not be retrieved.
- 无法创建 。The could not be created.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Authority { get; }
.property instance string Authority
Public ReadOnly Property Authority As String
public: property System::String ^ Authority { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个字符串，该字符串指定此 对象使用的 。

span.span: Returns a string that specifies the used by this object.

value.span: 包含指定 的身份验证部分的字符串。

span.span: The string which contains the authentication portion of the specified .

value.span: 对于安全的对等名称，此属性包含公钥，该公钥是一个长度为 40 个字符的十六进制字符串。

span.span: For secured peer names, this property contains the public key as a forty-character hexadecimal string.

value.span: 对于不安全的对等名称，此属性设置为零 (0)。

span.span: For unsecured peer names, this property is set to zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有所有者或对等主机，可以注册一个安全的对等名称。Only the owner, or peer host, can register a secured peer name. 对等名称被视为保护如果它支持自签名证书。A peer name is considered secured if it is backed by a self-signed certificate. 对等名称区分大小写，对等机名称的格式为：*颁发*。Peer names are case-sensitive and the format of a peer name is: *Authority.Classifier*. 例如，"0.MyPeerName"是格式正确的对等名称。For example, "0.MyPeerName" is a well-formed peer name.

para.span: 使用安全的对等名称不能确保网络应用程序的整体安全性。

span.span: Using a secured peer name does not ensure the overall security of the networking application.

para.span: 应用程序的安全性是视具体实现而定的。

span.span: Security of the application is implementation-dependent.

.property instance string Classifier
Public ReadOnly Property Classifier As String
public: property System::String ^ Classifier { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个字符串，其中包含对等 的分类器。

span.span: Returns a string that contains the classifier for a peer-to-peer .

value.span: 包含分类器部分的字符串，该部分用于标识 的对等名称或 PNRP 内的解析。

span.span: The string which contains the classifier portion used to identify a peer name for or resolution within a PNRP .

value.span: 除非显式指定，否则对于引用类型，所有属性的默认值均为 ；对于 类型的属性，默认值为零 (0)。

span.span: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is for reference types and zero (0) for properties of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对等机名称的格式：*颁发*。The format of a peer name is: *Authority.Classifier*. 对等机名称*分类器*组件可设置为包含 149 个或更少的 Unicode 字符，包括任何字符串`null`("\0") 终止符。The peer name *Classifier* component can be set to any string that contains 149 or fewer Unicode characters, including the `null` ("\0") terminator. 对等名称字符串的区分大小写。Peer name strings are case-sensitive. 有关安全的对等名称，分类器和颁发机构后面的点 （句点） 是可选的。For secured peer names, the classifier and the dot (period) after the authority are optional. 对于不安全的对等名称，分类器不是可选的。For unsecured peer names, the classifier is not optional.

summary.span: 用指定的对等主机名称创建指定的 对象的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the specified object with the specified peer host name.

returns.span: 一个表示指定的对等主机名称的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents the specified peer host name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对等主机是"种子节点"负责启动对等网络会话，邀请对等方参与此类型的网络连接是最适合于例如聊天组或游戏的通信的应用程序会话。The peer-to-peer host is the "seed node" responsible for initiating the peer-to-peer networking session, inviting peers to participate in applications for which this type of network connectivity is most appropriate for communications such as chat groups or game sessions. 此方法可以用于创建对象基于属性。This method can be used to create a object based on the property. 此对等名称不是节点的与调用的标识关联的。This peer name is not associated with the identity of the calling node.

exception.span: 提供的 不是一个有效的对等主机名称字符串。

span.span: The provided is not a valid peer host name string.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsSecured { get; }
.property instance bool IsSecured
Public ReadOnly Property IsSecured As Boolean
public: property bool IsSecured { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个布尔值，该值指定这是否是一个安全的对等名称。

span.span: Gets a Boolean value that specifies whether this is a secured peer name.

value.span: 如果为 ，则此对等名称是使用私钥/公钥对进行保护的。

span.span: If , this peer name is secured with a private key/ public key pair.

value.span: 其名称包含该对等计算机的用户证书公钥的安全哈希算法 (SHA) 哈希。

span.span: Its name contains the Secure Hash Algorithm (SHA) hash of the public key of the user certificate of that peer machine.

value.span: 否则，如果为 ，则对等名称没有关联的标识。

span.span: Otherwise, if , the peer name has no associated identity.

value.span: 除非显式指定，否则对于引用类型，所有属性的默认值均为 ；对于 类型的属性，默认值为零 (0)。

span.span: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is for reference types and zero (0) for properties of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对等名称被视为保护如果它支持自签名证书。A peer name is considered secured if it is backed by a self-signed certificate. 只有所有者可以向 PNRP 注册安全的对等名称。Only the owner can register a secured peer name with PNRP.

para.span: 使用安全的对等名称不能确保网络应用程序的整体安全性。

span.span: Using a secured peer name does not ensure the overall security of the networking application.

para.span: 应用程序的安全性是视具体实现而定的。

span.span: Security of the application is implementation-dependent.

MemberSignature.Value: public string PeerHostName { get; }
.property instance string PeerHostName
Public ReadOnly Property PeerHostName As String
public: property System::String ^ PeerHostName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对等主机的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the peer-to-peer host.

summary.span: 这是 DNS 编码版本的 ，它相当于 ，因为它们都是标识符。

span.span: This is a DNS-encoded version of the which is equivalent to a in that they are both identifiers.

summary.span: 二者之间的不同之处在于可视化表示形式。

span.span: The difference between the two is visual representation.

value.span: 一个表示对等主机名称的 值。

span.span: A value that is the name of the peer-to-peer host.

value.span: 除非显式指定，否则对于引用类型，所有属性的默认值均为 。

span.span: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is for reference types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对等主机是"种子节点"负责启动对等网络会话，邀请对等方参与此类型的网络连接是最适合于例如聊天组或游戏的通信的应用程序会话。The peer-to-peer host is the "seed node" responsible for initiating the peer-to-peer networking session, inviting peers to participate in applications for which this type of network connectivity is most appropriate for communications such as chat groups or game sessions. 属性指定对等方创建的对等网络会话中，以及认为该会话的主机的名称。The property specifies the name of a peer that created the peer-to-peer networking session, and which is considered the host of the session. 对等网络会话的主机可能会收集到多个对等节点。The host of a peer-to-peer networking session may collect peers into more than one . 此外，同时可能由多个对等主机承载对等方。Also, a peer may simultaneously be hosted by more than one peer host.
